input_text.Prompt:
The following is a product description written by our marketing expert using the following item features and item name.

Item name:
New Era NBA Women's Midnite Tech 9Twenty Adjustable Cap

Item features:
Polyester 100%
Imported
Women's lightly structured 9Twenty
Sublimated Gray blend pattern
Black with official team color
input_text.Response A: The New Era NBA Women's Midnite Tech 9Twenty Adjustable Cap is made of Polyester and imported. It is a Women's lightly structured 9Twenty with a sublimated Gray blend pattern.
input_text.Response B:
Sure thing! Here's the product description in simple language, like talking to a child:

"Hey there! This is a super cool cap that's perfect for any NBA fan girl like you! It's made of soft, stretchy material that will fit your head just right. The pattern is so cool, it's like a special gray color that's all mixed up. And the best part? It has your favorite team's colors too! It's imported from a faraway place, but it's worth the trip because it's so awesomely made. So grab it quick and show off your team spirit!"

input_meta.preamble_b: Respond using only short words and simple language, as if you were talking to a child.
